summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5742 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 11, Jefferson Park Division No. 2, being the alley between 14th Avenue South and Columbian Way, from Dakota Street to Nevada Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75797, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
